column1: S234BO.CARD.  1. CARD ONE
S234BO.DECK.  234. SURVEY NUMBER
S234BO.BALLOT.  X. BALLOT NUMBER GENERATED BY ROPER CENTER.
S234BO.FORM.  1. FORM A - ENLISTED MEN 2. FORM A - OFFICERS 3. FORM B - ENLISTED MEN 4. FORM B - OFFICERS
S234BO.Q1. WHAT IS YOUR ARMY RANK OR GRADE?  1. FLIGHT OFFICER OR WARRANT OFFICER 2. SECOND LIEUTENANT 3. FIRST LIEUTENANT 4. CAPTAIN 5. MAJOR 6. LIEUTENANT COLONEL
S234BO.Q2. HOW LONG HAVE YOU BEEN IN YOUR PRESENT GRADE?  1. 6 MONTHS OR LESS 2. OVER 6 MONTHS UP TO 1 YEAR 3. OVER 1 YEAR UP TO 2 YEARS 4. OVER 2 YEARS
S234BO.Q3. HOW OLD WERE YOU ON YOUR LAST BIRTHDAY?  1. 19 YEARS OR YOUNGER 2. 20 TO 24 YEARS 3. 25 TO 29 YEARS 4. 30 TO 34 YEARS 5. 35 YEARS OR OLDER

S234BO.Q4. HOW FAR DID YOU GO IN SCHOOL?  1. LESS THAN 6TH GRADE 2. FINISHED 6TH GRADE 3. FINISHED 7TH GRADE 4. FINISHED 8TH GRADE 5. SOME HIGH SCHOOL BUT DID NOT FINISH 6. GRADUATED FROM HIGH SCHOOL 7. SOME COLLEGE BUT DID NOT FINISH 8. GRADUATED FROM COLLEGE

S234BO.Q5. HOW LONG HAVE YOU BEEN IN THE ARMY? E. IF YOU HAVE BEEN IN THE ARMY BEFORE, THEN WERE OUT FOR A WHILE, JUST CHECK THE LENGTH OF TIME SINCE YOU ENTERED THIS LAST TIME. IF YOU WERE IN THE NATIONAL GUARD, CHECK THE LENGTH OF TIME SINCE YOUR OUTFIT CAME INTO THE ARMY.  1. 6 MONTHS OR LESS 2. OVER 6 MONTHS UP TO 1 YEAR 3. OVER 1 YEAR UP TO 2 YEARS 4. OVER 2 YEARS UP TO 3 YEARS 5. OVER 3 YEARS UP TO 4 YEARS 6. OVER 4 YEARS 0. NO ANSWER

S234BO.Q6. IN WHAT BRANCH OF THE ARMY DID YOU SERVE FOR THE LONGEST PERIOD OF TIME?  01. ENGINEERS 02. FIELD ARTILLERY 03. QUARTERMASTER CORPS 04. INFANTRY 05. MEDICAL DEPARTMENT 06. ARMORED FORCE AND TANK DESTROYER 07. SIGNAL CORPS 08. COAST ARTILLERY AND ANTI-AIRCRAFT 09. AIR CORPS 10. TRANSPORTATION CORPS 11. ORDNANCE DEPARTMENT 12. CHEMICAL WARFARE SERVICE 13. MILITARY POLICE 14. DEML (STATION COMPLEMENT) 15. OTHER 00. NO ANSWER
S234BO.Q7. IN WHICH OF THE ARMY FORCES DID YOU SERVE FOR THE LONGEST PERIOD OF TIME?  1. ARMY AIR FORCES 2. ARMY GROUND FORCES 3. ARMY SERVICE FORCES 0. NO ANSWER
S234BO.Q8A. ARE YOU:  1. SINGLE 2. MARRIED 3. DIVORCED OR SEPARATED 4. WIDOWED 0. NO ANSWER
S234BO.Q8B. HOW MANY CHILDREN DO YOU HAVE?  1. HAVE ONE CHILD 2. HAVE TWO CHILDREN 3. HAVE THREE OR MORE CHILDREN 4. HAVE NO CHILDREN 5. I'M NOT MARRIED 0. NO ANSWER
S234BO.Q10A. HAVE YOU SERVED OUTSIDE THE CONTINENTAL UNITED STATES IN THIS WAR?  1. YES 2. NO
S234BO.Q10B. IF YES, HOW LONG DID YOU SERVE OVERSEAS?  1. 6 MONTHS OR LESS 2. OVER 6 MONTHS UP TO 1 YEAR 3. OVER 1 YEAR UP TO 2 YEARS 4. OVER 2 YEARS UP TO 3 YEARS 5. OVER 3 YEARS 0. NO ANSWER

S234BO.Q10C. IF YES, HAVE YOU BEEN IN ACTUAL COMBAT IN THIS WAR?  1. YES, I HAVE BEEN IN ACTUAL COMBAT 2. YES, I HAVE BEEN UNDER ENEMY FIRE, BUT NOT IN ACTUAL COMBAT 3. NO 0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTIONS 11A, 11B AND 12 NOT CODED.

S234BO.Q13. HAS THE ARMY AT ANY TIME CLASSIFIED YOU AS A LIMITED SERVICE MAN?  1. YES, I WAS CLASSIFIED AS LIMITED SERVICE BY THE ARMY 2. NO, I WAS NEVER CLASSIFIED AS LIMITED SERVICE BY THE ARMY 3. I DON'T KNOW WHETHER THE ARMY HAS EVER CLASSIFIED ME AS LIMITED SERVICE OR NOT
S234BO.Q14A. AS FAR AS YOU KNOW, ARE YOU NOW CLASSIFIED BY THE ARMY AS PHYSICALLY FIT FOR OVERSEAS DUTY?  1. YES 2. NO 3. I DON'T KNOW 0. NO ANSWER
S234BO.Q14B. IN YOUR OWN OPINION, ARE YOU PHYSICALLY FIT FOR OVERSEAS DUTY?  1. YES 2. NO 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S234BO.Q15. IN GENERAL, WHAT SORT OF PHYSICAL CONDITION WOULD YOU SAY YOU ARE IN AT THE PRESENT TIME?  1. VERY GOOD PHYSICAL CONDITION 2. GOOD PHYSICAL CONDITION 3. FAIR PHYSICAL CONDITION 4. POOR PHYSICAL CONDITION 5. VERY POOR PHYSICAL CONDITION X. QUESTION 16 NOT CODED.

S234BO.Q17. WHERE WERE YOU LIVING MOST OF THE LAST FIVE YEARS OF YOUR CIVILIAN LIFE BEFORE YOU CAME INTO THE ARMY?  1. ON A FARM 2. IN THE COUNTRY BUT NOT ON A FARM 3. IN A VILLAGE WITH FEWER THAN 2,500 PEOPLE 4. IN A SMALL CITY WITH BETWEEN 2,500 AND 25,000 PEOPLE 5. IN A CITY WITH BETWEEN 25,000 AND 100,000 PEOPLE 6. IN A LARGE CITY WITH MORE THAN 100,000 PEOPLE 0. NO ANSWER

S234BO.Q18. WHICH OF THE FOLLOWING WERE YOU DOING JUST BEFORE YOU CAME INTO THE ARMY? (CHECK AS MANY AS YOU WERE DOING JUST BEFORE YOU CAME INTO THE ARMY.)  01. WORKING FULL-TIME FOR AN EMPLOYER, FOR SALARY, WAGES OR COMMISSION 02. GOING TO FULL-TIME SCHOOL OR COLLEGE 03. FARMING (EITHER WITH YOUR FAMILY OR FOR YOURSELF) 04. HAD MY OWN BUSINESS (DID NOT RECEIVE SALARY, WAGES OR COMMISSION) 05. LOOKING FOR A JOB 06. WORKING PART-TIME FOR AN EMPLOYER 07. GOING TO PART-TIME SCHOOL OR COLLEGE 08. SOMETHING ELSE (EDITED TO LIST, NOT CONSIDERED ONE OF A DOUBLE CHECK) 09. I WAS IN THE REGULAR ARMY 10. DOUBLE CHECKS 00. NO ANSWER X. QUESTION 19 NOT CODED.

S234BO.Q20. WHETHER YOU ARE A CHURCH MEMBER OR NOT, DO YOU CONSIDER YOURSELF:  1. CATHOLIC 2. JEWISH 3. PROTESTANT (FOR EXAMPLE, BAPTIST, METHODIST, ETC.) 4. OTHER (FOR EXAMPLE, MORMON, ORTHODOX, JEHOVAH'S WITNESSES, AGNOSTIC, ETC.) 0. NO ANSWER ****************************PART I****************************** P. HERE ARE SOME QUESTIONS ABOUT THE ARMY DISCHARGE PLAN:

S234BO.Q21. IN GENERAL, WHAT DO YOU THINK OF THE ARMY SCORE CARD PLAN (THE POINT SYSTEM)*  1. IT IS VERY GOOD 2. IT IS FAIRLY GOOD 3. IT IS NOT SO GOOD 4. IT IS NOT GOOD AT ALL 5. I DON'T KNOW ENOUGH ABOUT IT TO SAY 0. NO ANSWER

S234BO.Q22. IN YOUR OPINION, IS THE ARMY SCORE CARD PLAN (THE POINT SYSTEM) BEING CARRIED OUT THE WAY IT WAS SUPPOSED TO BE?  1. YES, I THINK IT IS BEING CARRIED OUT THE WAY IT WAS SUPPOSED TO BE 2. NO, I DON'T THINK IT IS BEING CARRIED OUT THE WAY IT WAS SUPPOSED TO BE 3. I DON'T KNOW ENOUGH ABOUT THE PLAN TO SAY 0. NO ANSWER

S234BO.Q23. HERE ARE FOUR STATEMENTS OF OPINION ABOUT THE POINT SYSTEM. CHECK THE ONE WHICH COMES CLOSEST TO YOUR OPINION.  1. THE POINT SYSTEM ITSELF WAS A GOOD IDEA, AND THE ARMY IS CARRYING IT OUT WELL 2. THE POINT SYSTEM ITSELF WAS A GOOD IDEA, BUT THE ARMY IS CARRYING IT OUT BADLY 3. THE POINT SYSTEM ITSELF WAS NOT A GOOD IDEA, BUT THE ARMY IS CARRYING IT OUT WELL 4. THE POINT SYSTEM ITSELF WAS NOT A GOOD IDEA, AND THE ARMY IS CARRYING IT OUT BADLY 5. I DON'T KNOW ENOUGH ABOUT IT TO SAY 0. NO ANSWER

S234BO.Q24. IN YOUR OPINION, HOW HARD IS THE ARMY TRYING TO SPEED UP THE DISCHARGE OF ENLISTED MEN?  1. THE ARMY IS TRYING ITS BEST 2. THE ARMY IS TRYING SOME, BUT NOT HARD ENOUGH 3. THE ARMY IS HARDLY TRYING AT ALL 0. NO ANSWER

S234BO.Q25. HAVE YOU HEARD OR READ ANYTHING ABOUT THE POSSIBILITY OF THE FOLLOWING CHANGE BEING MADE IN THE ARMY SCORE CARD PLAN - ALL ENLISTED MEN WITH TWO YEARS OR MORE SERVICE TO BE DISCHARGED IN THE NEAR FUTURE, REGARDLESS OF HOW MANY POINTS THEY HAVE?  1. YES, I HAVE HEARD OF THIS 2. NO, I HAVE NOT HEARD OF THIS BEFORE 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER
S234BO.Q26. AS FAR AS YOU KNOW, DOES THE ARMY AIR FORCES HAVE EXACTLY THE SAME DISCHARGE PLAN AS THE GROUND AND SERVICE FORCES?  1. YES 2. NO 0. NO ANSWER

S234BO.Q27. IN THE FUTURE, DO YOU THINK EVERY ABLE-BODIED YOUNG MAN SHOULD BE REQUIRED TO TAKE MILITARY OR NAVAL TRAINING FOR ONE YEAR?  1. YES 2. NO 3. NO OPINION *****************************PART II**************************** P. THE FOLLOWING STATEMENTS HAVE BEEN MADE BY DIFFERENT SOLDIERS ABOUT THE ARMY: READ EACH STATEMENT CAREFULLY. YOU WILL FIND THAT YOU AGREE WITH SOME AND DISAGREE WITH OTHERS. IF, ON THE WHOLE, YOU AGREE WITH A STATEMENT, CHECK THE WORD "AGREE". IF, ON THE WHOLE, YOU DISAGREE WITH A STATEMENT, CHECK THE WORD "DISAGREE". THERE ARE NO RIGHT OR WRONG ANSWERS. THE ONLY ANSWER TO GIVE IS YOUR OWN HONEST OPINION.
S234BO.Q1. "TOO MANY ARMY RULES AND REGULATIONS ARE UNNECESSARY*"  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER
S234BO.Q2. "PROMOTION IN THE ARMY IS BASED ON WHO YOU KNOW AND NOT WHAT YOU KNOW*"  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER
S234BO.Q3. "IT IS WRONG FOR A SOLDIER TO ,GOLDBRICK, IF IT MAKES MORE WORK FOR THE REST OF THE MEN*"  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER
S234BO.Q4. "THE LONGER A MAN STAYS IN THE FIGHTING, THE BETTER HE BECOMES AS A COMBAT SOLDIER*"  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER
S234BO.Q5. "IT IS ALL RIGHT FOR A SOLDIER TO BREAK ARMY RULES AND REGULATIONS IF HE DOESN'T GET CAUGHT*"  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER
S234BO.Q6. "ON THE WHOLE, I THINK THE ARMY HAS HELPED ME MORE THAN IT HAS HURT ME*"  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER
S234BO.Q7. "THE AIR FORCE HAS RECEIVED TOO GREAT A SHARE OF CREDIT FROM THE PUBLIC*"  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER
S234BO.Q8. "THERE IS TOO MUCH FAVORITISM AND POLITICS IN THE ARMY*"  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER
S234BO.Q9. "TOO MUCH TIME IS WASTED IN THE ARMY, WAITING AROUND AND DOING NOTHING*"  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER
S234BO.Q10. "THE ARMY WOULD BE A LOT BETTER IF OFFICERS AND ENLISTED MEN WERE MORE FRIENDLY WITH EACH OTHER*"  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER
S234BO.Q11. "DISCIPLINE IN THE ARMY IS TOO STRICT AND A LOT OF IT IS UNNECESSARY*"  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER
S234BO.Q12. "THE ARMY SHOULD HOLD MORE MILITARY PARADES AND CEREMONIES*"  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER
S234BO.Q13. "ON THE WHOLE, THE ARMY HAS NOT AWARDED DECORATIONS FAIRLY*"  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER
S234BO.Q14. "MILITARY COURTESY BUILDS UP A SOLDIER'S RESPECT FOR HIS OFFICERS*"  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER
S234BO.Q15. "THE LONGER A MAN HAS BEEN IN COMBAT, THE MORE PRIDE HE HAS IN HIS OUTFIT*"  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER
S234BO.Q16. "FEW OFFICERS TAKE UNFAIR ADVANTAGE OF THEIR RANK AND PRIVILEGES*"  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER
S234BO.Q17. "MOST SOLDIERS DO NOT LOSE RESPECT FOR A MAN WHO IS ALWAYS BUCKING FOR PROMOTION*"  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER
S234BO.Q18. "SOLDIERS SHOULD NOT BE GIVEN UNNECESSARY WORK TO DO, EVEN IF THEY HAVE NOTHING ELSE TO DO*"  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER
S234BO.Q19. "TRAINING IN MILITARY COURTESY IS OF LITTLE USE TO A COMBAT SOLDIER*"  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER
S234BO.Q20. "AN ENLISTED MAN IS USUALLY MORE CONCERNED WITH WHAT THE OTHER ENLISTED MEN IN HIS OUTFIT THINK OF HIM THAN WITH WHAT HIS OFFICERS THINK*"  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER
S234BO.Q21. "YOU CAN TRUST THE ARMY TO KEEP A PROMISE*"  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER
S234BO.Q22. "THE ARMY IS NOT TOO UNDEMOCRATIC*"  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER
S234BO.Q23. "MOST MP'S TREAT SOLDIERS FAIRLY*"  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER
S234BO.Q24. "I'D RATHER HAVE A LOUSY JOB IN A GOOD OUTFIT THAN A GOOD JOB IN A LOUSY OUTFIT*"  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER
S234BO.Q25. "THE ARMY PLACES TOO MUCH IMPORTANCE ON ,SPIT AND POLISH,*"  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER
S234BO.Q26. "MY EXPERIENCES IN THE ARMY HAVE PUT ME IN BETTER HEALTH*"  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER
S234BO.Q27. "MY EXPERIENCES IN THE ARMY HAVE GIVEN ME A LOT OF GOOD HABITS*"  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER
S234BO.Q28. "ONCE A MAN IS IN COMBAT, THE MAIN THING THAT KEEPS HIM FIGHTING IS HIS OWN PRIDE OR SELF-RESPECT*"  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER
S234BO.Q29. "MOST OFFICERS PUT THEIR OWN WELFARE ABOVE THE WELFARE OF THEIR ENLISTED MEN*"  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER
S234BO.Q30. "MOST SOLDIERS USUALLY WORK JUST HARD ENOUGH TO GET BY*"  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER
S234BO.Q31. "MOST SOLDIERS LOSE RESPECT FOR A MAN WHO IS ,TOO GI,*"  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER
S234BO.Q32. "MOST SOLDIERS DO NOT GET A KICK OUT OF GIVING A SNAPPY SALUTE*"  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER
S234BO.Q33. "MOST CIVILIANS APPRECIATE THE JOB THE SOLDIERS HAVE DONE*"  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER
S234BO.Q34. "I AM MORE RELIGIOUS THAN WHEN I FIRST ENTERED THE ARMY*"  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER
S234BO.Q35. "MOST MEN WHO WERE UNDER ENEMY FIRE IN THIS WAR DO NOT RESENT THE SOLDIERS WHO DID NOT SEE ACTION*"  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER
S234BO.Q36. "MY EXPERIENCES IN THE ARMY HAVE MADE ME MORE NERVOUS AND RESTLESS*"  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER

S234BO.Q38. "PATRIOTIC FEELING IS THE THING THAT HELPS MOST TO KEEP A SOLDIER IN THE FIGHT WHEN THE GOING GETS TOUGH*"  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER
S234BO.Q39. "IT IS GOOD TRAINING TO KEEP SOLDIERS IN THE DARK ABOUT THE REASONS FOR ORDERS SO THAT THEY GET USED TO UNQUESTIONING OBEDIENCE*"  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER
S234BO.Q40. "MOST SOLDIERS HAVE AN EASY TIME GETTING USED TO ARMY LIFE*"  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER
S234BO.Q41. "I MYSELF HAD AN EASY TIME GETTING USED TO ARMY LIFE*"  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER
S234BO.Q42. "AFTER A MAN HAS BEEN IN COMBAT A LONG TIME, HE COMES TO THINK MORE ABOUT THE OTHER FELLOWS IN THE OUTFIT AND LESS ABOUT HIS OWN SAFETY*"  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER
S234BO.Q43. "THE MAIN REASON MOST SOLDIERS OBEY ARMY RULES AND REGULATIONS IS BECAUSE THEY REALLY WANT TO AND NOT BECAUSE THEY HAVE TO*"  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER

S234BO.Q79. "MOST CIVILIANS THINK THAT IF YOU'RE ONLY A PRIVATE OR PRIVATE FIRST CLASS, IT'S BECAUSE YOU WEREN'T GOOD ENOUGH TO GET A RATING*"  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER
S234BO.Q80. "MOST SOLDIERS THINK THAT IF YOU'RE ONLY A PRIVATE OR PRIVATE FIRST CLASS, IT'S BECAUSE YOU WEREN'T GOOD ENOUGH TO GET A RATING*"  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER
S234BO.Q81. "I AM NOT GOING TO MISS THE OLD GANG OF FELLOWS IN MY OUTFIT WHEN I LEAVE THE ARMY*"  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER

S234BO.Q86. "A SOLDIER WHO HAS SEEN A LOT OF THE WAR HAS A RIGHT TO GET SORE WHENEVER HE IS ANNOYED BY A PERSON WHO DIDN'T GO THROUGH WHAT HE DID*"  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER
S234BO.Q87. "I DO NOT DRINK ANY MORE NOW THAN I DID BEFORE I ENTERED THE ARMY*"  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER

S234BO.Q88. "IN THE ARMY IT'S BEST TO DO YOUR JOB THE WAY YOU'RE TOLD, EVEN IF YOU KNOW THERE IS A BETTER WAY TO DO IT*"  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER ****************************PART III**************************** P. HERE ARE SOME QUESTIONS ABOUT SEVERAL DIFFERENT TOPICS:

S234BO.Q1. IN GENERAL, HOW DO YOU THINK MOST NON-COMS TEND TO LOOK AT THINGS - FROM THE OFFICER'S POINT OF VIEW OR THE ENLISTED MAN'S POINT OF VIEW?  1. FROM THE OFFICER'S POINT OF VIEW 2. FROM THE ENLISTED MAN'S POINT OF VIEW 0. NO ANSWER

S234BO.Q2. WHICH OF THE FOLLOWING KINDS OF OUTFITS WOULD YOU PERSONALLY PREFER TO BE IN?  1. AN OUTFIT WITH GOOD NON-COMS BUT POOR OFFICERS 2. AN OUTFIT WITH GOOD OFFICERS BUT POOR NON-COMS 0. NO ANSWER

S234BO.Q3. IF WHILE THE WAR WAS ON A SISTER OR GIRL FRIEND OF YOUR'S WAS THINKING OF JOINING THE WAC'S, WOULD YOU HAVE ADVISED HER TO JOIN OR NOT TO JOIN?  1. I WOULD HAVE ADVISED HER TO JOIN 2. I WOULD HAVE ADVISED HER NOT TO JOIN 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S234BO.Q4. IF A SISTER OR GIRL FRIEND OF YOUR'S WAS A NURSE AND WHILE THE WAR WAS ON WAS THINKING OF JOINING THE ARMY NURSES CORPS, WOULD YOU HAVE ADVISED HER TO JOIN OR NOT TO JOIN?  1. I WOULD HAVE ADVISED HER TO JOIN 2. I WOULD HAVE ADVISED HER NOT TO JOIN 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER
